build.buildCommand: composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-scripts --no-interaction && npm ci && npm run build && mkdir -p storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R a+rw storage && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache

deploy.startCommand: php artisan config:cache && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
